abstract: First-quarter profit for Dow Chemical fell 20 percent while Eastman Chemical said profit fell 27 percent.
snippet: First-quarter profit for Dow Chemical fell 20 percent while Eastman Chemical said profit fell 27 percent.
lead_paragraph: Two major chemical companies reported first-quarter profit declines yesterday on softening demand and higher raw material costs.

headline.main: Profits Decline for 2 Makers of Chemicals
headline.print_headline: Profits Decline For 2 Makers Of Chemicals

abstract: The chief executive of Dow Chemical, which has been rocked by revelations of a secret plan to take it private, on Thursday launched an impassioned defense of his strategy, saying he had “earned the right” to run the company.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of Dow Chemical, which has been rocked by revelations of a secret plan to take it private, on Thursday launched an impassioned defense of his strategy, saying he had “earned the right” to run the company.
